content:
No, no!
I'm not thinking about going on strike!
       <size=30>Please don't say anything like that to Captain Mo!</size>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
And then... could it... 
Is that even possible?
Oh! I get it now!
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
"It's not that we can't rest, but rather we should carefully calculate the balance between rest and work during crucial times, hoho..."
That's what Captain Mo said.
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
N-no way! I won't close up shop!
There's always more work to do at the store.
I-I'm really passionate about my job, you know...
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
Captain Mo must have his reasons for saying that!
<size=30>He's secretly planning the <color=#8AAB4B>Neighborhood Center</color>, you know~!</size>
<size=30>The "can-do-absolutely-anything" kind!</size>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content: Starting today, please do not disturb! <style=SizeSmall>...gotta focus on my business and all that...</style>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
And then me! I want to have regular working hours...
If I don't plan my time well for selecting goods, restocking, and minding the store,
I tend to get drowsy and space out...
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
And then, we need to be ready for anything that might happen...
Like if our neighbors who moved here need help in the middle of the night
but can't find anyone... that would be really tough... <style=SizeSmall>I should probably leave a note with my address, just in case...</style>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content: No rest for me, I love working! <style=SizeSmall>Even if my tiny legs are getting tired...</style>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
Hmm? Just as I thought!
That's the kind of determination and grit you need to find the perfect work-life balance!
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
Captain Mo might look gentle,
but when it comes to providing services for everyone,
he absolutely won't allow any slacking off.
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3
格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content: I-I was thinking that today, <size=30>I could crawl into a box with an apple,</size> <size=30>and maybe take a little nibble...</size>
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
Since the Camp facilities are still pretty basic,
we need to stay here 24/7 until everything's properly set up.
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you've collected so many materials for the Astralink station...
maybe you should take a break?
info: 格连小店-格连_主流程文本3
